body:
Howdy.

As some of you may be aware, I've recently taken over the Longest Bow Shot Record project from {tag=48924ea33aad4e16838c368d8d9e0a25}. In the past, there was only a Overcast section, however it now has an Avicus section as well.

Website HERE!

Reply to this topic with your longest bow shots, so we can record them. Be sure to include the map name, the gamemode, and how long the shot was. You must provide picture proof as well (all pictures should be full images, cropped pictures of chat will not be accepted).

Shots we don't accept
  • Set-up shots
Please make sure your record will get you on the leader board before posting it on this thread.
body_tagged:
Howdy.

As some of you may be aware, I've recently taken over the Longest Bow Shot Record project from Matic0B. In the past, there was only a Overcast section, however it now has an Avicus section as well.

Website HERE!

Reply to this topic with your longest bow shots, so we can record them. Be sure to include the map name, the gamemode, and how long the shot was. You must provide picture proof as well (all pictures should be full images, cropped pictures of chat will not be accepted).

Shots we don't accept
  • Set-up shots
Please make sure your record will get you on the leader board before posting it on this thread.
title: ► Avicus Network Longest Bow Shot Records ◄

replies.body: Just to note, full cropped pictures neither do set up shots count. We are only keen on seeing shots that were not purposely made to be a long shot and please provide evidence of the shot that is not cropped.
replies.body_tagged: Just to note, full cropped pictures neither do set up shots count. We are only keen on seeing shots that were not purposely made to be a long shot and please provide evidence of the shot that is not cropped.

replies.body:
All bow records with screenshot evidence has been uploaded to the site.

There's still lots of empty records no one has filled! The full list can be view here. I personally challenge everyone of you to get at least 1 record.

https://mcresourcepile.github.io/stattrack/avicus/bow
